translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Reversal of Terms
The Numerical Series of Terms in the Order of Declension

original: Nahetuṁ nasārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.🔽Nahetuṁ nacittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….🔽Nahetuṁ nacetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na hetum na sa ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka  na hetum na cittam dhammam paṭicca  na hetum na cetasikam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: With a non-cause, non-object as condition … (in brief) … with a cause, one … with an unspecific, one.🔽With a non-cause, non-consciousness as condition …🔽With a non-cause, non-mental-formation as condition … (in brief) … with a cause, one … with an unspecific, one.

original: Nahetuṁ nacittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ nacittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na hetum na citta sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca pe na hetum na citta sasaṭṭham dhammam paṭicca pe hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: With a non-cause, non-concomitant with consciousness as condition … With a non-cause, dissociated from consciousness as condition … (in brief) … with a cause, one … with an unspecific, one.

original: Nahetuṁ nacittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na hetum na citta samuṭṭhānam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: With a non-cause, non-originated from consciousness as condition … (in brief) … with a cause, one … with an unspecific, one.

original: Nahetuṁ nacittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ nacittānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na hetum na citta sahabhum dhammam paṭicca pe na hetum na citta anuparivattim dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: With a non-cause, non-conascent with consciousness as condition … With a non-cause, non-consecutive with consciousness as condition … (in brief) … with a cause, one … with an unspecific, one.

original: Nahetuṁ nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ🔽dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na hetum na citta sa saṭṭha samuṭṭhānam dhammam paṭicca pe na hetum na citta sa saṭṭha samuṭṭhāna sahabhu  dhammam paṭicca pe na hetum na citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna anuparivattim dhammam paṭicca
translated: With non-cause, not arisen from mind-contact as condition …🔽With non-cause, not conascent with what is not arisen from mind-contact as condition …

original: …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.🔽Nahetuṁ naajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….🔽Nahetuṁ nabāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.🔽Nahetuṁ naupādādhammaṁ paṭicca ….🔽Nahetuṁ naupādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….🔽Nahetuṁ naanupādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: saṅkhitta hetuyāḥ ekam pe avigate eka  na hetum na ajjhattikam dhammam paṭicca  na hetum na bāhiram dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka  na hetum na aupādā dhammam paṭicca  na hetum na aupādinnam dhammam paṭicca  na hetum na anupādinnam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: With non-cause, not postnascent to what is not arisen from mind-contact as condition …

original: Nahetuṁ noupādānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ nokilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe….
analyzed: na hetum no upādānam dhammam paṭicca pe na hetum no kilesam dhammam paṭicca pe
translated: (In brief.) With cause as condition, one … With non-cause as condition, one … With an internal as condition, one … With an external as condition, one … With an internal and an external as condition, one … With neither internal nor external as condition, one … With a great as condition, one … With a small as condition, one … With a great and a small as condition, one … With neither a great nor a small as condition, one … With a beautiful as condition, one … With an ugly as condition, one … With a beautiful and an ugly as condition, one … With neither a beautiful nor an ugly as condition, one … With a good as condition, one … With a bad as condition, one … With a good and a bad as condition, one … With neither a good nor a bad as condition, one … With a neutral as condition, one … With a not-neutral as condition, one … With a neutral and a not-neutral as condition, one … With neither a neutral nor a not-neutral as condition, one … With an ariyan as condition, one … With a non-ariyan as condition, one … With an ariyan and a non-ariyan as condition, one … With neither an ariyan nor a non-ariyan as condition, one … With a worldly as condition, one … With an unworldly as condition, one … With a worldly and an unworldly as condition, one … With neither a worldly nor an unworldly as condition, one … With a conditioned as condition, one … With an unconditioned as condition, one … With a conditioned and an unconditioned as condition, one … With neither a conditioned nor an unconditioned as condition, one … With a resultant as condition, one … With a non-resultant as condition, one … With a resultant and a non-resultant as condition, one … With neither a resultant nor a non-resultant as condition, one … With a causally-arisen as condition, one … With a not causally-arisen as condition, one … With a causally-arisen and a not causally-arisen as condition, one … With neither a causally-
